Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory12.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Everyone, we've reached the coordinates of the weapon suppliesâ€”ah, this is...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Such an eerie sight.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The Constructs here are all blown to pieces, and paint is all over their body parts.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Voice in the dark', 3: 'Those... detestable... humans...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voice in the dark', 3: 'Have... they come to... destroy my... work again...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee kneels, then touches and checks the graffiti with his fingers.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Composes mostly of Construct vital fluids... with a mixture of industrial coloring, fluorescent agents, and mixed coolants.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Looks like they aren't using Construct fluids just to paint these horrid-looking graffiti, but also as a weapon.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Voice in the dark', 3: "H-horrid...? That imbecile... He's saying my work is... horrid...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Yes, a weapon. What blew up these Constructs is likely a bomb made from pressurized paint.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'These bombs would cause an almost instantaneous drop in temperature after its explosion, slowing down the affected targets.', 4: '3'}
{2: "Seems like it's learning and evolving.", 3: '30', 4: 'What a monster.', 5: '32'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Indeed. They go to such disgusting lengths to fight against humanity.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You really cannot expect even an ounce of conscience in the Corrupted...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "There's no peace to be made between us... Liv, is the area scan complete?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Yes! The Levi-Gun parts the supply squad mentioned is nearby.', 4: '1'}
